Hi Matthias,

Summing the angle error at each joint sounds like a reasonable
appraoch to me. Have you tried the problem  with just one joint (one
error angle), if that doesn't work that would suggest there is a
problem elsewhere. I think that would be my approach at this point in
time, going by what you have said.

Colin.
